title: Summarize News Article
content: Summarize the following article in 3 bullet points. Focus on key facts and implications.

title: Product Review Analyzer
content: Analyze this product review and return the sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) and list 3 key pros and cons.

title: Polite Rewriter
content: Rewrite the following sentence to sound more polite and professional, keeping the original meaning.

title: JSON to Table
content: Convert the following JSON data into a clean HTML table with headers and rows.

title: Content Moderator
content: Check this message for offensive or inappropriate content. Return 'safe' or 'flagged' with a reason.

title: Translate & Formalize
content: Translate the following informal Spanish message into English and rephrase it in a formal tone.
